text: You start your day like you start everyday, you are at work in a meeting. Your Boss (Paul) is telling you and your co-workers where you are going to be inspecting today, You are going to be inspecting the Hammer Valley Dam.
You are in a corridor on the 7th floor, Your Boss reminds you to not forget your hard-hat.
You can see some stairs, your co-workers are talking about public transport and how the tunnels arent going to suddenly collapse.
You try to get to the stairs but fail. You spot an elevator nearby.
While exiting the door you look down to the lobby area.
You enter the elevator. You press the button for the 8th floor.
You wait patiently as you get to the 8th floor. While exiting you look at the gray-sky and a cruise ship. You think if you should stay here a bit more or get your gear.
You go to your office, get your gear (Flashlight, Hard-Hat, Camera and car-keys). You think about taking a stroll through the server room. Or maybe sitting in your office chair a bit more?
You go to the elevator get on, press the button for the 1st floor and wait.
Suddenly when you get to the 3rd floor the elevator brakes. The lights turn off and a fuse panel cover falls off. You remember something about opening the doors by resetting the fuses.
You get out of the elevator unharmed. You say: Guess I'll have to take the stairs. You go to the stairs.
You go down a floor. You are now on the 2nd floor. The cafeteria is here.
You go down a floor. You are now on the 1st floor. You take a stroll trough the server room. You see a note on the table.
The note reads: If you're reading this then congrats on getting out of that dumb game. Our servers have been hacked and the entire building is crazy.
You get to the reception. You see a letter for you. You're worried it's a parking ticket. The receptionist tells you it's just a set of keys.
You go to the garage. You take the car. You drive to the first location.
